message:
ora hefajote islamer andulon niye jata bole..ami jokon nicher kotha golo boli..make block kora hoi..tokhon bujtepari..tara shadhinota niyeo business kore...sottikare manobotar sadhinota tara caina..ora odhikar adayer dabi niye odhikar horoner songrame besto...

shunun islam santir dhormo..r moulik odhikar gulor modde nij nij dhormo paloner odhikar sonrokkito..tai sobai amra jar jar dhomo palone sorbuccho onuragi...
1jon dhormo pran manus kkno tar dhormo o dhormo gurur obomanona sohho korbena..
r islami jonota shanti prio bolei ora nirosro andolone nemeche..r tader 13ti dabite kothao onno dhormer birudde kichu bole nai..shudhu tader nejjo odhikar adayer dabi tule dhoreche..r sorkar ta amole niye ar grohon joggota proman koreche..
-Fan Post
